title: (x) TexasPete wavy caps - (similar to) Maiandra {Stephen}
content:
I’d like to use this “look” for a patch I have to design.  
Is there a typeface that would give me the “T” to start with?  
Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194807im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TexasPete_4980.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Levis" paint logo - custom {Sandro Emanuel Martins Lopes}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194807/http:/typophile.com/node/33027 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) El Buen Gusto Mexican Cuisine serif - Mirarae {Brett Jordan} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194807/http:/typophile.com/node/32966 "Go to next forum topic")
author: thesignguy

comments.content:
Thanks to both...think I’ll try the Maiandra GD.  
Time to go shopping!
